title: Unable to connect to Binance Spot Testnet
body: #### Expected Behavior After getting an API Key and Secret from [Binance Spot Testnet](https://testnet.binance.vision/), I am able to connect to Binance Spot Testnet #### Actual Behavior When deploying to live in the following dialog box: If I choose **Demo** in the Environment setting, I get the following error: If I choose **Real** in the Environment setting, then I get the following: #### Potential Solution Need to check the Binance integration #### Reproducing the Problem Duplicate the steps above #### Checklist - [x] I have completely filled out this template - [x] I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current `master` branch - [x] I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues) - [x] I have provided detailed steps to reproduce the issue

comments.body: Hey @jimmychu0807! Just testing this and can't reproduce the issue ur experiencing locally or in QC cloud, it might of been some down time from binance spot testnet, please re test 👍. If u still experience the issue please contact QC cloud support.
